attributes.action:
Keep Hartlepool's Court Open. 

Say No to becoming a Ghost Town.
attributes.background:
The Ministry of Justice is proposing that Hartlepool's Courts close and that the service is transferred to Teesside. This will deprive the residents of the town of a vital service and will result in the denial of justice to some of the most needy & vulnerable in our society. 
We Oppose the proposal
